Returns the parameters the distribution was constructed with.

@1@ Returns the {{math|p}} distribution parameter. It defines the probability of a trial generating {{c|true}}. The default value is {{c|0.5}}.

@2@ Returns the {{math|k}} distribution parameter. It defines the number of desired outcomes. The default value is {{c|1}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ The {{math|p}} distribution parameter.

@2@ The {{math|k}} distribution parameter.
